name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-fd1bd79b85d46ccd34931dc28ce9c9c4a50f949f "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
